title: Pandora 's advertising revenue 2006 to 2017
summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars 1074.93 is found at Month Jan to Dec 2017 and the minimum is found at Feb 2006 to Jan 2007 where Month is 3.25.
There is a difference of 1071.68 between the maximum Month Jan to Dec 2017 and minimum Month Feb 2006 to Jan 2007.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in million U.S. dollars for 12 number of Months.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is highest at Month Jan to Dec 2017 and lowest at Month Feb 2006 to Jan 2007.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
The maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars 1074.93 is found at Month Jan to Dec 2017 and the minimum is found at Feb 2006 to Jan 2007 where Month is 3.25.
There is a difference of 1071.68 between the maximum Month Jan to Dec 2017 and minimum Month Feb 2006 to Jan 2007.
max_summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Revenue in million U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
The Revenue in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Month Jan to Dec 2017 and lowest at Month Feb 2006 to Jan 2007.
The minimum Month Feb 2006 to Jan 2007 has got 330.75 times less Revenue in million U.S. dollars than the maximum Month Jan to Dec 2017.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars at Month Jan to Dec 2017 is 1074.93 , second place is Jan to Dec 2016 at 1072.49, and thirdly is Jan to Dec 2015 at 933.31.
Over the past 12 Months, the Revenue in million U.S. dollars has lowered.
Considered together, the average Revenue in million U.S. dollars in all 12 Months is roughly 426.82.
